product_name: Club Ride New West Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Ever mountain bike in plaid? Here's your chance. The Club Ride New West bike jersey has technical details you'll appreciate on the trail and cool style for when you're chillin' afterwards. Lightweight polyester fabric wicks and dries quickly when you're working up a sweat. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Western-inspired snaps are backed by a hidden zipper, giving you the ventilation control you'd expect in a jersey. Full-side and underarm venting provides cooling airflow, especially on the downhill. Zippered back pocket with media port keeps essentials close but out of the way.
short_description: Ever mountain bike in plaid? Here's your chance. The Club Ride New West bike jersey has technical details you'll appreciate on the trail and cool style for when you're chillin' afterwards.
